author: rpluem
msg: * Disable persistent connections for SSL backends again as we do not
handle them correctly, because we recreate backend->connection for each
request and thus try to initialize an already existing SSL connection.

author: danielf
msg: Disabled non working tests and fixed the first of the problems with the virtual sitemap component test cases.

author: thorsten
msg: Enhanced description of the structurer templating.
[depreciated] the xdocs locations and added the new url based locations.

author: chamikara
msg: Changed the version from 1.0-SNAPSHOT to SNAPSHOT
Changes to the termination policy. A sequence can terminate in two ways
1. A client setting the LAST_MESSAGE property
2. A client calling the Sandesha2ClientAPI.terminateSequence() method
